channel.title: Auto smelting/mining?
channel.description:
Ok, somehow i got woodcutting to auto give logs clicking the tree once, same as cooking, and rune ess.... but the others such as smelting ores into bars, and mining copper, tin, iron, mith, addy, and rune do not want to auto give ores..
How does this get fixed i do not understand, please help.
**BUMP**
